titleStmt.title: Ecclesiastici, or, The history of the lives, acts, death & writings, of the most eminent fathers of the church, that flourisht in the fourth century wherein among other things an account is given of the rise, growth, and progress of Arianism, and all other sects of that age descending from it : together with an introduction, containing an historical account of the state of paganism under the first Christian emperours / by William Cave ...
titleStmt.author: Cave, William, 1637-1713.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.R. for Richard Chiswel ...,

notesStmt.note: "An appendix: containing a brief account of some other eminent fathers that flourish'd in this fourth century" has separate paging and special t.p. with imprint: London: Printed by A. Godbid and J. Playford, 1682.
Chronological table at end of appendix: p. 49-61.
Includes "Contents of the introduction", p. [20]-[24] and "Contents of the book", p. [25]-[53]
This item appears at reels 527:2 and 811:7.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
